snippet: Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver said on Monday that he asked Vito J. Lopez, a Brooklyn Democrat currently embroiled in a sexual harassment scandal, to resign on Friday, but that he was rebuffed.
abstract: New York Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver says that he asked Vito J Lopez, a Brooklyn Democrat currently embroiled in a sexual harassment scandal, to resign, but that Lopez has refused to give up his Assembly seat.
lead_paragraph: Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver said on Monday that he asked Vito J. Lopez, a Brooklyn Democrat currently embroiled in a sexual harassment scandal, to resign on Friday, but that he was rebuffed.

headline.seo: Assemblyman Vito Lopez Refused Request to Step Down, Speaker Says
headline.main: Speaker Says He Asked Assemblyman to Resign
headline.print_headline: Speaker Says He Asked Assemblyman to Resign
